2024.lrec-tutorials.7.title: The DBpedia Databus Tutorial: Increase the Visibility and Usability of Your Data
2024.lrec-tutorials.7.author: Milan Dojchinovski
2024.lrec-tutorials.7.abstract: This tutorial introduces DBpedia Databus (https://databus.dbpedia.org), a FAIR data publishing platform, to address challenges faced by data producers and consumers. It covers data organization, publishing, and consumption on the DBpedia Databus, with an exclusive focus on Linguistic Knowledge Graphs. The tutorial offers practical insights for knowledge graph stakeholders, aiding data integration and accessibility in the Linked Open Data community. Designed for a diverse audience, it fosters hands-on learning to familiarize participants with the DBpedia Databus technology.
